::Hunter::

Hunter growls, flying after the Cyber Bee and firing his rifle and 
optic blasts at it. His wounds begin to leak mechfluid, reminding him 
of his damage.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> The optic blasts barely miss the nimly flying bee. Then it suddenly 
dives
> largely and follows scorponok.
